 2000-06322000-05-040,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CREDIT NOTE INFORMATION REGULATIONS by reducing the overall amount of information that must be set out in a credit note used as proof of adjustment, allowing debit notes issued by an intermediary to be used for that purpose, and by revising the Long and Short Titles to that effect and to make reference to the Harmonized Sales Tax.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0179 Publication Date: 2000-05-24
